subject: Re: Tesing-testing
author: Fiona Broome
full_text:
Hi,

Frank, you mentioned June 17th and 22nd... I'll be watching the PEAR project (RNG anomalies) anyway, but I think I've found what they're talking to you about:

http://unixronin.livejournal.com/763082.html

Yes, that could be the biggest & best lightshow, ever.  Get your lawn chairs ready!

Cheerfully,
Fiona



> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@> wrote:
> >
> >  So does that mean there was a possiblity of a something event on May 7th?
> > Got anything for June 17th, or 22nd?
> > 
> >  Frank-S
> >
